Row.Text: [B]Rome [/B] was a precursor Civilization to the [B]Ottomans[/B].
[B]Egypt [/B] was a precursor Civilization to the [B]Ottomans[/B].
The [B]Abbasid[/B] were a precursor Civilization to the [B]Ottomans[/B].
[B]Conquering a Capital[/B] was an important part of the [B]Ottomans'[/B] identity.

First through the breached walls of the fallen capital, a group of {1_Civilization_Adj} soldiers from the frontier lead the celebratory march. Their comrades eye them with admiration and envy, eager to join the elite squad. The taste of glory sparks a way of life.
